original_title: Mourir à Ibiza (un film en trois étés)
overview: In the last days of summer, Lena arrives in Arles and waits for Marius, an ex-boyfriend she reconnected with online. Marius keeps her waiting, and meanwhile she meets Maurice and Ali, respectively baker and gladiator. In Arles, Etretat and Ibiza, facing all dangers, their friendship will last three summers.
title: Dying in Ibiza (A Film in Three Summers)
